column4: Anyone knows how to edit the Grub options when booted, some of the line I want to remove, noob!
there's no info on the grub.conf????????????????????????????
did u try the Desktop > Preferences> Mouse ?
There's no way to enable the scroll wheel from that dialog.
ok I cant help u....try ubuntu guide?
erm... look in the grub conf?  I've never looked for a way to do it.
k3b is for Kde I'm afraid? I use gnome,  no kde here....can install k3b?
K3B works fine on GNOME.  It requires kde-libs, but it won't hurt you.  =)
